snippet: Novak Djokovic made tennis history at Wimbledon on Wednesday when he notched up the most consecutive grand slam match victories in the Open Era, and said he aimed to continue his assault on the record books....
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic made tennis history at Wimbledon on Wednesday when he notched up the most consecutive grand slam match victories in the Open Era, and said he aimed to continue his assault on the record books.

headline.print_headline: History Man Djokovic Aims to Keep Breaking Records
headline.main: History Man Djokovic Aims to Keep Breaking Records
